title: Cyber Monday at Crypto.Fashion
author: VD
content_html: Crypto.Fashion asked me to remind you that this and other great t-shirts are on sale through the end of the day. Also, I should mention that the announcement I alluded to this weekend has been postponed until further notice. So, you’ll have to wait a little longer for the latest Alt★Hero art to be revealed.
